Method Detail

wrapUI

public PromptTextUI wrapUI(javax.swing.text.JTextComponent textComponent)

Creates a new PromptTextUI, which wraps the given textUI.

If textUI is of type PromptTextUI, textUI will be returned. If textUI is of type BasicTextFieldUI a BuddyTextFieldUI object will be returned. If textUI is of type BasicTextAreaUI a PromptTextAreaUI object will be returned.

Specified by:
wrapUI in class TextUIWrapper<PromptTextUI>
Parameters:
textComponent - wrap this components UI
Returns:
a PromptTextUI which wraps textUI
